title: What Are the Hot Sellers This Christmas? - The After Show
itunes:title: What Are the Hot Sellers This Christmas? - The After Show
description:
Today, we are taking a look at what is selling well at 2 Guys this Christmas season. Are different things selling on the mail order side?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
